faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Clear answers to your common concerns about mental health care.
faq.a1: Yes, absolute confidentiality is our top priority. All consultations and medical records are kept completely private in accordance with medical ethics and law.
faq.q2: Do you treat both anxiety and depression?
faq.a2: Yes, we specialize in evidence-based treatments for both anxiety disorders and clinical depression, tailored to each patient's unique needs.
faq.q3: Can I book an appointment through WhatsApp?
faq.a3: Certainly. You can use the quick WhatsApp button on our website for an immediate response and booking support.
faq.q4: How long does the treatment usually take?
faq.a4: The duration of treatment varies significantly depending on the individual and the nature of the condition. We focus on long-term, sustainable healing.
faq.q5: When should I consult a psychiatrist?
faq.a5: You should consider a consultation if you experience persistent symptoms like sadness, excessive worry, sleep disturbances, or mood swings that interfere with your daily life.
